DOC.brief_summary: Migraine common medical condition . Several study suggest obesity and/or weight gain risk factor aggravate migraine course , especially increase frequency headache episode . The aim current study evaluate whether nutritional intervention would able improve clinical parameter ( assess MIDAS HIT ) patient migraine .
DOC.detailed_description: Women diagnosis migraine accord International Headache Society ( IHS-2 ) criterion receive individualized diet meal plan nutritional orientation 12 week accord nutritional diagnosis . Patients evaluate three time interval 30 day visit . Clinical , anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , waist circumference body composition assess bioelectrical impedance analysis ) food evaluation perform . Nutritional orientation strengthen visit . The diet prescription change intervention period . The diet quality patient assessed Brazilian Healthy Eating Index - Revised ( BHEI-R ) version . Migraine severity assess Headache Impact Test ( HIT ) Migraine Disability Assessment Scale ( MIDAS ) . Depressive symptom also evaluate Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) .
DOC.criteria: Women ; Older 18 year ; Migraine diagnosis ; Agree sign inform consent . Patients headache characterized migraine ; Pregnant lactate woman .
